bibl.bibl: Huxley, Thomas Henry. 1855a. On certain zoological arguments commonly adduced in favour of the hypothesis of the progressive development of animal life in time. [Read 20 April 1855.] Notices of the Proceedings at the meetings of the members of the Royal Institution of Great Britain 2 (1854–8): 82–5. Reprinted in Foster and Lankester, eds. 1898–1903, 1: 300–4.
